mapper.insert: insert into immortal ( id, cname, fname, gender, field, avatar, nationality, born, birth, death, constellation, college, contribution, honor, description, view, favor, create_account, create_time, modify_account, modify_time ) values (#{id}, #{cname}, #{fname}, #{gender}, #{field}, #{avatar}, #{nationality}, #{born}, #{birth}, #{death}, #{constellation}, #{college}, #{contribution}, #{honor}, #{description}, #{view}, #{favor}, #{create_account}, #{create_time}, #{modify_account}, #{modify_time})

insert into immortal ( id, cname, fname, gender, field, avatar, nationality, born, birth, death, constellation, college, contribution, honor, description, view, favor, create_account, create_time, modify_account, modify_time ) values (#{id}, #{cname}, #{fname}, #{gender}, #{field}, #{avatar}, #{nationality}, #{born}, #{birth}, #{death}, #{constellation}, #{college}, #{contribution}, #{honor}, #{description}, #{view}, #{favor}, #{create_account}, #{create_time}, #{modify_account}, #{modify_time})
